name: Snake dices
description:
In this snake game you must eat the dices to earn points. There is two types of dices:

The green dice will add n parts to the snake, where n is the number on the face of the dice.

The red dice will remove n parts where n is also the number on the face of the dice.

If you try to eat a red dice that has a higher number that the number of parts in your snake you will lose.

Credits:

The music is Discord by Nul Tiel Records

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/nul-tiel-records/ep/discord/
